header.title: Your future starts here!
header.description: At the Antivirus Foundation for Dropout Prevention, we believe that everyone deserves access to the best opportunities. That's why we offer a personalized platform where you can explore scholarships, courses, and programs tailored to your interests and needs.

nodoEafit.title: Nodo Eafit
nodoEafit.description: Participate in training programs and workshops at EAFIT University in the field of technology to enhance your skills and knowledge. Sign up today!

velezReyes.title: VélezReyes+ Scholarships
velezReyes.description: They offer financial support to outstanding students. Apply for your scholarship and achieve your educational goals.

comfama.title: Comfama
comfama.description: Access educational and recreational programs with Comfama. Find the perfect opportunity for your personal and professional growth.

proVocacion.title: Pro-Vocation
proVocacion.description: Discover your true vocation through our Pro-Vocation program. We help you identify your strengths and explore the best educational and professional options. Take the first step towards your future today!

asesoriaSociopedagogica.title: Sociopedagogical Counseling
asesoriaSociopedagogica.description: Receive personalized guidance to overcome educational challenges. Our sociopedagogical counseling offers tools and strategies to improve your academic performance and personal well-being.

testSociovocacional.title: Sociovocational Test
testSociovocacional.description: Not sure which career is best for you? Our Sociovocational Test will guide you in choosing a career based on your interests, skills, and personal values. Discover your ideal path!

footer.contactUs: Want to know more about us?

register.heading: Ready to find your next opportunity?

profileCreation.title: Registration and creation of personal profile
profileCreation.description: Create your personal profile to highlight your achievements, skills, and aspirations. This will allow you to have a personalized presence within our community, making it easier to access opportunities that are right for you.

saveOpportunities.title: Save opportunities
saveOpportunities.description: Find and save relevant opportunities that align with your interests and academic goals. This way, you can easily access them in the future and not miss any important offers.

personalizedRecommendations.title: Personalized recommendations
personalizedRecommendations.description: Receive specific suggestions tailored to your needs and profile. Our intelligent system will analyze your interests and provide you with recommendations that will help you make the most of the available opportunities.

exclusiveContent.title: Exclusive content
exclusiveContent.description: Access a variety of exclusive resources and materials designed to support you on your academic and professional journey. These include guides, webinars, workshops, and much more, all designed to help you succeed.

changeTheory.title: THEORY OF CHANGE
changeTheory.description: Identify students with vulnerabilities and accompany them holistically, through an ecosystem of strategies focused on academic, economic, and socio-emotional support for retention.

mission.title: MISSION
mission.description: Increase graduation rates of students in technology-related degrees and programs through strategies that promote retention and prevent dropout.

vision.title: VISION
vision.description: In 5 years, we will have a national presence in the top 10 universities in the country, where we will have reduced the dropout rate by 10 percentage points (from 50% to 40%). In addition, we will be replicating a model that is a reference, whose success can be measured qualitatively and quantitatively.

values.title: VALUES
values.description: At the Antivirus Foundation for Dropout Prevention, we do our work collaboratively, with passion, integrity, autonomy, empathy, commitment, and teamwork. We are supportive and innovative, and we have a strong sense of service.

purpose.title: PURPOSE
purpose.description: To build a prosperous, peaceful, harmonious, technological, and competitive country where all young people have access to education and are good human beings, with goals and empowered in their lives. Thanks to this, we will overcome poverty and become a reference for development.

targetAudience.title: TARGET AUDIENCE
targetAudience.description: We work with students in IT-related degrees and programs in Secondary and Postsecondary Education. We focus our intervention on students vulnerable to dropout.

priorities.title: PRIORITIES
priorities.item1: Consolidate a model with processes for identifying vulnerabilities, intervention, and outcome indicators.
priorities.item2: Explore intervention models from schools to help reduce dropout in higher education.
priorities.item3: Get to know and involve other actors in the work for retention (Rectors, Deans, MEN, Companies, among others).
priorities.item4: Help reduce dropout in other universities and programs to refine our model and generate income that contributes to the sustainability of the Antivirus Foundation.

ourMission.heading: WHO WE ARE?
ourMission.descriptionTitle: WE ARE A NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT
ourMission.description: Seeks to reduce student dropout rates in Colombia, improve retention and graduation rates, as our way of contributing to achieving a country with more education and consequently with more development.
